p: In addition, worthy of note is the study by Molander et al. (2011), which addressed the treatment of venomous snake bites and analyzed the local medicinal flora of Brazil, Nicaragua, Nepal, China and South Africa. As a result, families Apocynaceae, Lamiaceae and Rubiaceae performed as overused groups in at least two of the five countries. In addition, analyzes at the genus level have shown that the Piper L. group was overused in at least two of the countries described ( Chase et al., 2016).
